example.text: Big, price-gouging corporations are padding their pockets and boosting their profits at the expense of hardworking American families. Unacceptable. [[url]]

This government funding bill reflects priorities I have long worked to advance -lowering health care costs, keeping our promises to seniors and veterans, investing in education and job training, and addressing the unique needs of our community. I am proud that this bipartisan, bicameral bill includes funding for my Regional Innovation Hubs legislation and 15 Community Project Funding requests , supports law enforcement and our military, and invests in the VA, Social Security Administration, and Internal Revenue Service to ensure American taxpayers receive their benefits and refunds in a timely manner.

Proud to co-sponsor the Invest to Protect Act: a bill to provide much-needed resources to small, local police departments like those in #PA07, to ensure they have the training and resources to protect and serve our communities. [[url]]

This is a bill Congress must pass, one that has historically been overwhelmingly bipartisan-and so as one of the most bipartisan members of Congress, I've compromised across the aisle to pass an NDAA that supports ourmilitary and protects our national security. However, this year's bill was nothing like NDAAs of the past: it was hijacked by extreme DC Republicans who are playing politics with national security so they can pursue their agenda of banning abortion nationwide.
